room_title: Escape room "The Machine" by The Game Room Adventure Cafe in Sacramento
room_address: 2085 Vine Street Suite 106, El Dorado Hills, CA 95762
room_description: Trillick Inc. is hiring you as outside consultants to break into Dr. David Addlestein's lab to investigate what he's been up to these last few months. His funding was pulled but his lab still pulls a significant amount of electricity and reports of strange noises come from behind the doors to the control rooms. Nobody has heard or seen from Addlestein in a week and the energy levels are increasing more and more. Pretty soon they will reach critical levels and destroy the entire facility. His research must be reclaimed and the lab shut down.
